q1.question:
Reorder the git commands below to correspond with the following tasks:

  1. Display the branch you currently are on.
  2. Change from one branch to another.
  3. See what files have changed since the latest commit.
  4. See how files have changed since the latest commit.
  5. Stage the changes you have made.
  6. Record the changes you have made.
  7. List the commits recorded in the repository.

q2.question: Which of the following statements about make, gdb, and valgrind are true (select all that apply)?

responses.make_new: <tt>make</tt> only rebuilds targets whose sources have been modified.
responses.make_target: <tt>make</tt> allows referencing the target of a rule with <tt>$@</tt>
responses.make_source: <tt>make</tt> allows referencing the source of a rule with <tt>$@</tt>
responses.gdb_print: <tt>gdb</tt> allows users to interactively print out the values of variables in memory.
responses.valgrind_print: <tt>valgrind</tt> allows users to interactively print out the values of variables in memory.
responses.gdb_symbols: <tt>gdb</tt> requires the program to be compiled with the <tt>-g</tt> flag to be display line numbers.
responses.valgrind_symbols: <tt>valgrind</tt> requires the program to be compiled with the <tt>-g</tt> flag to be display line numbers.

q3.question:
Considering the program sum, answer the following questions:

  1. What is the sum of the numbers between 1 and 100 (inclusive)? ____
  2. What is the maximum size of the numbers array (ie. what is the value of (1<<10)? ____
  3. What key sequence would you use to signal the end of input? ____

q4.question: Which of the following statements about the course is true (select all that apply)?

responses.exams: There are two exams in this class.
responses.attendance: Students are expected to attend class regularly and on-time.
responses.office_hours: There are in-person office hours and students may schedule appointments with the instructor if desired.
responses.deadlines: There are no deadlines in this class.
responses.respect: Students are expected to be respectful of their fellow classmates and the instructional staff.
responses.video: There is no video capture for this class.
responses.references: Students may consult online references or copy from resources if properly cited.
responses.solutions: Students may consult or copy from solutions found online or from other students or from AI tools.
